name: places/ChIJ89JowsZYwokRaJtoaQ-q21w
adrFormatAddress: 2451 1st Ave., New York, NY 10035, USA

originalText.text: SCAM. COMPLETE RIP OFF! -- Do not bring your vehicle here. -- They can't even do an oil change correctly. Had my car serviced and what should have been a simple easy repair. The paint job was awful, the car came back with missing parts, and the oil change caused $3K IN DAMAGES as oil leaked all over the engine. On top of all of that, they called me after taking nearly a month for these basic repairs to tell me my car was undrivable which was a complete lie in order to run up my bill with brake pads and other nonsense. I gave them several opportunities to fix these issues and they have not cooperated. All in all, I've been repeatedly lied to, overcharged and I'm out over $12K not including two months of car payments and insurance. I've spent months going back and forth trying to resolve just getting the runaround. "My partner will call you" "I will get this resolved" and they never call. I'm taking Sports & classics to court and filing complaints with the better business bureau and department of state. If I could give this business negative 100000 stars I would. See you in court.
